summary: Led instructional teams and delivered hands-on STEM curriculum for large student cohorts in programming and robotics.
highlights: Led a team of 6 instructors while coordinating daily operations for programs serving 200+ students ages 10–17.
Taught hands-on courses in Python, C++, and robotics to strengthen students’ programming and engineering fundamentals.
Partnered with site leadership to improve parent satisfaction and optimize the overall student experience.

summary: Supported undergraduate physics labs by guiding students through experiments and improving instructional workflows.
highlights: Facilitated weekly lab sections for 40+ students using electrical and magnetic experimental equipment.
Provided one-on-one mentoring and served as a communication bridge between students, graduate TAs, and faculty.
Collected student feedback and conducted interviews that informed department-wide lab structure improvements.

summary: Built interactive product features and data-driven UI experiences to improve usability and engagement for a startup platform.
highlights: Engineered an interactive "periodic table of molecules" experience to improve readability and engagement across 50+ molecules.
Designed and shipped product features that improved engagement and readability and supported a $10k fundraising milestone.
Collaborated directly with founders and executives to align technical delivery with business goals.
